sentences.sentence: He was much weakened constitutionally by the disease.
sentences.translation: 那场病使得他体质大大减弱。

sentences.sentence: He said the court provided no guidance about when recusal will be constitutionally required.
sentences.translation: 他说，最高法院没有明确指导规定，在什么情况下应该要求取消资格。

sentences.sentence: We are constitutionally mandated to act as the directing and coordinating authority on health.
sentences.translation: 《组织法》规定我们要充任卫生方面的指导和协调机关。
